name: Gutenberg Blocks – Unlimited blocks For Gutenberg
author: ThemeHunk

sections.description:
The Unlimited Blocks is an Addon Plugin For Gutenberg Block Editor. Quickstart the Gutenberg editor with Powerful and elegant blocks to design stunning websites.
Free Unlimited Blocks plugin that amplifies the default WordPress Gutenberg Editor with 17+ powerful blocks.

Unlimited Blocks is the editor blocks that are used to create content layouts that you can insert onto anywhere on your WordPress post or pages.

  1. Docs

An Unlimited Gutenberg Blocks Library

  • Advance Column
  • Woocommerce Product Slider
  • Advance Content & Image Slider
  • Icon Block
  • Google Map
  • Service / Team Section
  • Pricing Box
  • Linear Progress Bar
  • Circular Progress Bar
  • Post Grid Layout
  • Post List Layout
  • Post Slider Layout
  • Post Category Layout
  • Post 2 Image Layout
  • Post 3 Image Layout
  • Post 4 Image Layout
  • Post 5 Image Layout
  • Post 6 Image Layout
sections.installation:
1. Upload the unlimited-blocks.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How to Install Plugin

Just upload the unlimited-blocks.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, and then activate it from ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
